snippet.title: When the Past was Around - Steam Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the game on Steam:
- http://bit.ly/wpwa-steam 

Play the prologue chapter for free:
- http://bit.ly/wpwa-prologue

- - - - -

From the creators of A Raven Monologue and Coffee Talk.

When the Past was Around is an adventure puzzle-escape game about love, loss, moving on, and letting go.

When the Past was Around is now available on Steam.
Coming to Nintendo Switch, PS4, and XBox in November 2020.

Developer: Mojiken Studio, Toge Productions
Publisher: Toge Productions, Chorus Worldwide (JP)

- - - - -

Follow on Twitter!
- http://twitter.com/WPWAgame

Join the Discord Community!
- http://discord.gg/toge

Link to all platforms
- http://linktr.ee/whenthepastwasaround
